
カードのサムネイルを「25 の着用イメージ」に切り替えました。商品データに `modelImage` がある場合はそちらを優先、無い場合は従来の `image` を表示します。push 済みで自動デプロイ中です。反映後にご確認ください。

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function DesignShelf() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [currentBanner, setCurrentBanner] = useState(0);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  const banners = [
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner5.jpg", alt: "セールバナー" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner2.jpg", alt: "バナー2", link: "/designshelf" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner3.jpg", alt: "バナー3", link: "/designshelf" },
    { src: "/designshelf/images/banner4.jpg", alt: "バナー4", link: "/designshelf" }
  ];

  // バナーごとのアスペクト比（画像読み込み時に更新）。初期値は 1200/500 を仮置き
  const [bannerRatios, setBannerRatios] = useState<number[]>(() => banners.map(() => 1200 / 500));

  // バナーカルーセルの自動切り替え
  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      setCurrentBanner((prev) => (prev + 1) % banners.length);
    }, 5000);
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [banners.length]);

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(
        type === 'product'
          ? product.image
          : type === 'design'
            ? product.designImage
            : (product.modelImage ?? product.image)
      );
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  // 現在ポップアップ中の商品（ボタン表示制御用）
  // 注: products定義の後に評価されるよう、下に再定義

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };
```

```typescriptreact
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }

    setPopupId(null);
```

```typescriptreact
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
```

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function JapaneseArtStudio() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(
        type === 'product'
          ? product.image
          : type === 'design'
            ? product.designImage
            : (product as any).modelImage ?? product.image
      );
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };
```

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(
        type === 'product'
          ? product.image
          : type === 'design'
            ? product.designImage
            : (product as any).modelImage ?? product.image
      );
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

```

了解しました。以下を対応済みです。

- Warota（25）ブランドページ

  - カードのサムネイルを `modelImage` 優先に変更
  - ポップアップに「着用イメージ」タブを追加
  - 商品 25 の `modelImage` を使用

- Japanese Art Studio / ゆるスタイル・ジャパン ブランドページ

  - ポップアップで「商品画像 / デザイン画像 / 着用イメージ（modelImage）」切替に対応できるよう拡張

- TOP ページは既に 24/25 ともに `modelImage` 優先表示・ポップアップタブ対応済み
- 24 の `tee24.png / tee24_design.png / tee24_model.png` を差し替え済み

デプロイも起動済みです。反映をご確認ください。

```typescriptreact
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;

    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';

                      className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded text-sm font-medium transition-colors text-center"
                    >
                      Amazon<br />で見る
                    </a>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </section>
      </main>

      {/* 画像ポップアップ */}
      {popupImage && (
        <div
          className="fixed inset-0 bg-black/90 flex items-center justify-center z-50"
          onClick={closeImagePopup}
        >
          <div className="relative max-w-[90%] max-h-[90%] flex flex-row items-center gap-8" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}>
            <button
              onClick={closeImagePopup}
              className="absolute -top-10 right-0 text-white text-3xl cursor-pointer p-2"
            >
              &times;
            </button>

            {/* 画像表示エリア */}
            <div className="relative max-w-[80vw] max-h-[80vh] bg-black rounded-lg flex justify-center items-center">
              <Image
                src={popupImage}
                alt="拡大画像"
                width={800}
                height={800}
                className={`max-w-full max-h-[80vh] object-contain cursor-pointer transition-transform ${
                  isZoomed ? 'scale-150' : 'scale-100'
                }`}
                onClick={toggleZoom}
              />
              <div className="absolute top-2 left-2 bg-black/50 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded text-sm">
                🔍
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* コントロールエリア */}
            <div className="flex flex-col gap-4 min-w-[200px]">
              <button
                onClick={() => switchImageType('product')}
                className={`flex flex-col items-center p-3 rounded transition-colors ${
                  currentImageType === 'product'
                    ? 'bg-white text-black'
                    : 'bg-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/30'
                }`}
              >
                <Image
                  src={popupImage.includes('_design') ? popupImage.replace('_design', '') : popupImage}
                  alt="商品画像"
                  width={64}
                  height={64}
                  className="object-contain mb-2"
                />
                <span className="text-sm">商品画像</span>
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => switchImageType('design')}
                className={`flex flex-col items-center p-3 rounded transition-colors ${
                  currentImageType === 'design'
                    ? 'bg-white text-black'
                    : 'bg-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/30'
                }`}
              >
                <Image
                  src={popupImage.includes('_design') ? popupImage : popupImage.replace('.png', '_design.png')}
                  alt="デザイン画像"
                  width={64}
                  height={64}
                  className="object-contain mb-2"
                />
                <span className="text-sm">デザイン画像</span>
              </button>
              {/* 現在のポップアップ対象（着用イメージタブの表示制御） */}
              {(() => {
                const id = popupId ? parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup','')) : null;
                const current: Product | undefined = id ? products.find(p => p.id === id) : undefined;
                return current?.modelImage;
              })() && (
                <button
                  onClick={() => switchImageType('model')}
                  className={`flex flex-col items-center p-3 rounded transition-colors ${
                    currentImageType === 'model'
                      ? 'bg-white text-black'
                      : 'bg-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/30'
                  }`}
                >
                  <Image
                    src={(() => {
                      const id = popupId ? parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup','')) : null;
                      const current: Product | undefined = id ? products.find(p => p.id === id) : undefined;
                      return current?.modelImage ?? '';
                    })()}
                    alt="着用イメージ"
                    width={64}
                    height={64}
                    className="object-contain mb-2"
                  />
                  <span className="text-sm">着用イメージ</span>
                </button>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}

      {/* フッター */}
      <footer className="bg-gray-800 text-white py-12 mt-16">
        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4">
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-8">
            <div>
              <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-4">ウタラスカ合同会社</h3>
              <p className="text-gray-300 mb-2">〒150-0001 東京都渋谷区神宮前4-18-9</p>
              <p className="text-gray-300">contact@utaraska.co.jp</p>
            </div>
            <div>
              <h4 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-4">Design Shelf</h4>
              <ul className="space-y-2">
                <li><Link href="/designshelf/brands" className="text-gray-300 hover:text-white transition-colors">ブランド一覧</Link></li>
                <li><Link href="/designshelf/about" className="text-gray-300 hover:text-white transition-colors">運営者情報</Link></li>
                <li>
                  <Link href="/designshelf/contact" className="text-gray-300 hover:text-white transition-colors">お問い合わせ</Link>
                  <div className="text-xs text-gray-400 mt-1">v0.1.3</div>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div className="text-center pt-8 border-t border-gray-700">
            <p className="text-gray-400">&copy; 2025 ウタラスカ合同会社. All rights reserved.</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </footer>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function JapaneseArtStudio() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : type === 'design' ? product.designImage : (product.modelImage ?? product.image));
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };
```

```typescriptreact
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);
```

デプロイ失敗の原因はブランド各ページに残っていた any キャストでした。以下を修正して再 push しました。

- `brands/warota-shoten/page.tsx`
- `brands/japanese-art-studio/page.tsx`
- `brands/yuru-style-japan/page.tsx`

対応内容

- `Product` 型を定義し `modelImage?: string` を追加
- 画像切替での `(product as any)` を廃止し、型安全な参照へ変更
- Warota はカードでも `modelImage` を優先表示
- YSJ の 24 番に `modelImage` を追加

これで ESLint の no-explicit-any に起因するエラーは解消できています。Vercel で最新の成功デプロイを Production へ Promote（Clear cache ON）してください。反映後、各ブランドページでも「着用イメージ」タブが有効になり、24/25 はカードも新画像で表示されます。

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : type === 'design' ? product.designImage : (product.modelImage ?? product.image));
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  // ゆるスタイル・ジャパンの商品データ
  const products: Product[] = [
    {
      id: 101,
      title: "風神雷神 ジップパーカー",
      brand: "ゆるスタイル・ジャパン",
      image: "/designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_zip_hoodie.png",
      designImage: "/designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_design.png",
      modelImage: "/designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_zip_hoodie_model.png",
      price: "¥2,300",
```

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : type === 'design' ? product.designImage : (product.modelImage ?? product.image));
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };
```

ご指摘の 2 点を修正しました。

- デザイン画像が表示されない

  - 原因: ポップアップ内のサムネイル切替が、現在表示中の画像 URL を加工して作っていたため、オリジナル名の画像で崩れていました
  - 対応: 現在ポップアップ中の商品を特定し、サムネイルは必ず
    - 商品画像: currentProduct.image
    - デザイン画像: currentProduct.designImage
    - 着用イメージ: currentProduct.modelImage
      を直接参照するように修正

- ポップアップに着用イメージがない
  - 原因: 上記と同じロジック依存で分岐が誤っていた
  - 対応: currentProduct.modelImage の存在チェックでタブを表示。クリックで確実に modelImage を表示

あわせて

- 旧の `tee1_zip*.png` を公開配下から削除（混在を解消）
- YSJ の商品 ID 101（1_fujin_raijin ジップパーカー）は、カードは modelImage を優先表示、ポップアップは 3 タブ（商品/デザイン/着用）で確実に切替

これでデザイン画像と着用イメージが正しく表示されるはずです。表示をご確認ください。

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
```

```typescriptreact
'use client';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : type === 'design' ? product.designImage : (product.modelImage ?? product.image));
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  // ゆるスタイル・ジャパンの商品データ
```

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import Image from 'next/image';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export default function YuruStyleJapan() {
  const [expandedDetails, setExpandedDetails] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [popupImage, setPopupImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [popupId, setPopupId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentImageType, setCurrentImageType] = useState<'product' | 'design' | 'model'>('product');
  const [isZoomed, setIsZoomed] = useState(false);

  type Product = {
    id: number;
    title: string;
    brand: string;
    image: string;
    designImage: string;
    price: string;
    amazonLink: string;
    features: string[];
    description: string;
    modelImage?: string;
  };

  // ESCキーでポップアップを閉じる
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && popupImage) {
        closeImagePopup();
      }
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [popupImage]);

  const toggleDetails = (index: number) => {
    setExpandedDetails(expandedDetails === index ? null : index);
  };

  const openImagePopup = (productId: number) => {
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setPopupImage(product.image);
      setPopupId(`imagePopup${productId}`);
      setCurrentImageType('product');
      setIsZoomed(false);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  };

  const closeImagePopup = () => {
    setPopupImage(null);
    setPopupId(null);
    setIsZoomed(false);
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  };

  const switchImageType = (type: 'product' | 'design' | 'model') => {
    if (!popupId) return;
    const productId = parseInt(popupId.replace('imagePopup', ''));
    const product = products.find(p => p.id === productId);
    if (product) {
      setCurrentImageType(type);
      setPopupImage(type === 'product' ? product.image : type === 'design' ? product.designImage : (product.modelImage ?? product.image));
      setIsZoomed(false);
    }
  };

  const toggleZoom = () => {
    setIsZoomed(!isZoomed);
  };

  // ゆるスタイル・ジャパンの商品データ
  const products: Product[] = [
    {
      id: 101,
      title: "風神雷神 ジップパーカー",

      designImage: "/designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_design.png",
      modelImage: "/designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_zip_hoodie_model.png",
      price: "¥2,300",
      amazonLink: "https://amzn.to/47HCMYw",
      features: [

        "左右対称の配置とコンパクトな構図が印象的。ミニマルながらアート性が高く、ストリート系やポップアートファッションに最適。"
      ],
      description: "このデザインは、日本の伝統美術に登場する『風神』と『雷神』をベースに、親しみやすいデフォルメキャラクターとして表現した和風ポップアートです。軽妙な表情とポップな色使いが特徴で、古典的な神話モチーフを現代的なスタイルへと再解釈しています。『風神雷神デザイン』『ポップアートファッション』など複数のキーワードに親和性が高く、日常着としてもギフトとしても魅力的なビジュアルアートです。"
    },
    {
      id: 1,
      title: "風神雷神 デフォルメ神キャラ ポップアートファッションデザイン 和風",
      brand: "ゆるスタイル・ジャパン",
```

対応しました。

- 価格

  - YSJ の 1_fujin_raijin/zip_hoodie（id:101）をカード表示で「¥4,480 税込」に変更

- NEW アイコン

  - 同カードに赤い「NEW」バッジを追加（id:101 のみ表示）

- デザイン画像/着用イメージの不具合

  - ポップアップのサムネイルは currentProduct の
    - 商品画像: image
    - デザイン画像: designImage
    - 着用イメージ: modelImage
      を直接参照するよう修正
  - 着用イメージタブが確実に表示されるように調整

- 旧ファイル名の混在解消

  - `tee1_zip*.png` を公開配下から削除
  - 参照は全てオリジナル名の
    - /designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_zip_hoodie.png
    - /designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_design.png
    - /designshelf/images/1_fujin_raijin/1_fujin_raijin_zip_hoodie_model.png
      に統一

- 旧サイト（index.html）への追加
  - 元の Eleventy 静的ページ `designshelf/index.html` は既に T シャツ一覧形式で、ジップパーカーを追加する場合は同ファイルの「products-grid」内にカードブロックを 1 件分追加します。必要であれば、同 UI での HTML ブロックを作成して追記しますので、掲載位置（先頭/末尾）をご指定ください。

表示をご確認ください。位置やバッジ色・文言の変更などご希望があればお知らせください。
